attributes.action: Make Friday part of the weekend so that people are better rested.
attributes.additional_details: So everyone is better rested so they can concerntrate better in school or at work.
attributes.background: Make Friday part of the weekend.

rejection.details:
The hours an employee is expected to work is a contractual matter between them and their employer, and is not something the UK Government is directly responsible for. 

You could have a petition calling for the Government to reduce the maximum number of hours a person can legally be required to work in any given week, if that is something you'd like to see happen.

You might also like to sign this petition which calls for a related action:

Require schools close at 1pm on Friday so Muslims can go to mosque: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611729
